TITLE.P: Preliminary market consultation — New maintenance facilites for DSB

SHORT_DESCR.P: DSB is planning to establish 3 maintenance facilities dedicated to the new electric trains that DSB is in the process of procuring. DSB is preparing the tender material for the procurement of the design contract in regards to the maintenance facilities. DSB expects to initiate the tendering process late august 2018 and plans to sign the contract regarding the design of the maintenance facilities approximately one year later.
Prior to initiating the procurement proces regarding the design contract DSB wishes to inform potential tenderers of the coming tender.

DSB is currently in the process of procuring new electric passenger trains in order to service the Danish railnetwork for electrification. DSB is planning to establish three maintenance facilities dedicated to the new electric trains, all with access to main line tracks. According to the current plan the 3 maintenance facilities will belocated in the Aarhus area, in central Copenhagen, and in Fredericia respectively. However, the final decision regarding the locations of the maintenance facilities is awaiting relevant authority approvals.

The tender material DSB is preparing concerns the design of the 3 maintenance facilities. The contract is planned to cover all buildings and all infrastructure needed for maintaining the electric trains. It is the intention that the organization of the workshops at the 3 locations should be largely identical in order to support standardized work flows.

DSB wishes to provide the market with information concerning the concepts and ideas behind the planned maintenance facilities and to give potential tenderers time to prepare themselves for the tender and to consider entering into consortiums. Therefore DSB will facilitate an information meeting on 11.4.2018 between 15:00 and 16:00 hours local time for all interested potential participants, where DSB will present the concepts and ideas behind the planned maintenance facilities. Furthermore DSB intends to send information concerning the planned maintenance facilities to registered potential tenderers.
DSB invites interested potential participants to register for participation in the preliminary market consultation by responding to this notice on email nyevaerksteder@dsb.dk
In this message please indicate the names of the persons attending the information meeting and the email addresses for receipt of information. If possible, please register before 4.4.2018.

INFO_ADD.P: Please note that the market dialogue is being undertaken on a without prejudice basis with no obligations placed on either DSB or any registered participant. By conducting the market dialogue, DSB does not commit itself to any subsequent tender process. Moreover, any decision by a potential tenderer not to participate in the market dialogue will not affect the potential tenderer's possibility to participate fully in any subsequent tender.
